--- pagetitle: "Martini CG Force-Field" page-layout: custom section-divs: false toc: false css: index.css editor: source execute: echo: false description: | A General Purpose Coarse-Grained Force Field. hide-description: true resources: - images/martini.gif --- ::: {.hero-banner} ::: {.content-block} ::: {.hero-text} **Welcome to the Martini FF Initiative** A General Purpose Coarse-Grained Force Field Simplify your simulations and unlock new insights into complex biomolecular systems by joining the Martini community 🚀🚀 ::: {.hero-buttons} [Downloads](docs/downloads/index.qmd){.btn-action-primary .btn-action .btn .btn-success .btn-lg role="button"} [Publications](docs/publications/index.qmd){.btn-action-primary .btn-action .btn .btn-info .btn-lg role="button"} ::: ::: ::: {.hero-animation} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: {.content-block} ::: {.features} ::: {.feature} ### Visualizing Martini (using VMD) Some of the VMD commands that can be used to visualize Martini CG systems. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/visualizing_martini.qmd) ::: ::: ::: {.feature} ### Simulating lipid bilayers Studying membrane properties through molucular dynamics simulations with Martini CG lipid models. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/lipids_and_lipidome.qmd) ::: ::: ::: {.feature} ### Parametrizing new molecules How to build a Martini topology for new molecules. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/parametrizing.qmd) ::: ::: ::: {.feature} ### Simulating soluble and membrane proteins Regular workflow and protocols to set up Martini CG simulations of proteins. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/proteins.qmd) ::: ::: ::: {.feature} ### Setting up double-stranded DNA How to set up and try out DNA Martini simulations. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/dna.qmd) ::: ::: ::: {.feature} ### Simulating polymers Parametrization and simulation of polymers. ::: {.learn-more} [Learn more »](docs/tutorials/martini2/polymers.qmd) ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: {.get-started .alt-background} ::: {.content-block} [Tutorials](docs/tutorials/index.qmd){.btn-action-primary .btn-action .btn .btn-success .btn-lg role="button" style="margin-top: 1em;"} ::: :::
